table.name: civicrm_custom_field
table.comment: Stores info about an extended (custom) property (data and form field info).

field.name: id
field.comment: Unique Custom Field ID

field.name: custom_group_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_custom_group.

field.name: label
field.comment: Text for form field label (also friendly name for administering this custom property).

field.name: data_type
field.values: String, Int, Float, Money, Memo, Date, DateTime, Boolean, StateProvince, Country,File,Link
field.comment: Controls location of data storage in extended_data table.

field.name: html_type
field.values: Text, TextArea, Select, Multi-Select, Radio, CheckBox, Select Date, Select Date/Time, Select State/Province, Select Country,File,Link
field.comment: HTML types plus several built-in extended types.

field.name: default_value
field.comment: Use form_options.is_default for field_types which use options.

field.name: is_required
field.comment: Is a value required for this property.

field.name: is_searchable
field.comment: Is this property searchable.

field.name: is_search_range
field.comment: Is this property range searchable.

field.name: weight
field.comment: Controls field display order within an extended property group.

field.name: help_pre
field.comment: Description and/or help text to display before this field.

field.name: help_post
field.comment: Description and/or help text to display after this field.

field.name: mask
field.comment: Optional format instructions for specific field types, like date types.

field.name: attributes
field.comment: Store collection of type-appropriate attributes, e.g. textarea needs rows/cols attributes

field.name: javascript
field.comment: Optional scripting attributes for field.

field.name: is_active
field.comment: Is this property active?

field.name: options_per_line
field.comment: number of options per line for checkbox and radio

field.name: start_date_years
field.comment: Date may be up to start_date_years years prior to tcurrent date

field.name: end_date_years
field.comment: Date may be up to end_date_years years after to tcurrent date

field.name: date_parts
field.comment: which date part included in display

field.name: note_columns
field.comment: Number of columns in Note Field

field.name: note_rows
field.comment: Number of rows in Note Field

field.name: column_name
field.comment: Name of the column that holds the values for this field.

field.name: option_group_id
field.comment: For elements with options, the option group id that is used
